verses.verse: It was for <S%G1657>freedom<s%> that <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1659>set<s%> us <S%G1659>free;<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> keep <S%G4739>standing<s%> <S%G4739>firm<s%> and do not be <S%G1758>subject<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to a <S%G2218>yoke<s%> of <S%G1397>slavery.<s%>

<S%G2396>Behold<s%> I, <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> to you that <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G4059>receive<s%> <S%G4059>circumcision,<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> will be of <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G5623>benefit<s%> to you.

And I <S%G3143>testify<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> who <S%G4059>receives<s%> <S%G4059>circumcision,<s%> that he is <S%G3781>under<s%> <S%G3781>obligation<s%> to <S%G4160>keep<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3551>Law.<s%>
You have been <S%G2673>severed<s%> from <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> you <S%G3748>who<s%> are seeking to be <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G3551>law;<s%> you have <S%G1601>fallen<s%> from <S%G5485>grace.<s%>
For we through the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> by <S%G4102>faith,<s%> are <S%G553>waiting<s%> for the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>

For in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> <S%G2480>means<s%> <S%G5100>anything,<s%> but <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1754>working<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G26>love.<s%>
You were <S%G5143>running<s%> <S%G2573>well;<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1465>hindered<s%> you from <S%G3982>obeying<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>?
<S%G3588>This<s%> <S%G3988>persuasion<s%> [did] not [come] from Him who <S%G2564>calls<s%> you.
A <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G2219>leaven<s%> <S%G2220>leavens<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G5445>lump<s%> [of dough.]

I <S%G3982>have<s%> <S%G3982>confidence<s%> in you in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> that you will <S%G5426>adopt<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G5426>view;<s%> but the one who is <S%G5015>disturbing<s%> you shall <S%G941>bear<s%> his <S%G2917>judgment,<s%> <S%G3748>whoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> he is.

But I, <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> am I <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G1377>persecuted<s%>? <S%G686>Then<s%> the <S%G4625>stumbling<s%> <S%G4625>block<s%> of the <S%G4716>cross<s%> has been <S%G2673>abolished.<s%>
<S%G3785>Would<s%> that <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G387>troubling<s%> you would <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G609>mutilate<s%> themselves.

For you were <S%G2564>called<s%> to <S%G1657>freedom,<s%> <S%G80>brethren;<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> [do] not [turn] your <S%G1657>freedom<s%> into an <S%G874>opportunity<s%> for the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> but <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>

For the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G3551>Law<s%> is <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3056>word,<s%> in the [statement], "You shall <S%G25>love<s%> your <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> as <S%G4572>yourself.<s%>"

But <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G1143>bite<s%> and <S%G2719>devour<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G991>take<s%> <S%G991>care<s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> you be <S%G355>consumed<s%> by <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>
But I <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> and you will not <S%G5055>carry<s%> out the <S%G1939>desire<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>

For the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G1937>sets<s%> its <S%G1937>desire<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> and the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh;<s%> for <S%G3778>these<s%> are in <S%G480>opposition<s%> to <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that you may not <S%G4160>do<s%> the things that you <S%G2309>please.<s%>
But <S%G1487>if<s%> you are <S%G71>led<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> you are not <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>Law.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G2041>deeds<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> are <S%G5318>evident,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> are: <S%G4202>immorality,<s%> <S%G167>impurity,<s%> <S%G766>sensuality,<s%>

<S%G1495>idolatry,<s%> <S%G5331>sorcery,<s%> <S%G2189>enmities,<s%> <S%G2054>strife,<s%> <S%G2205>jealousy,<s%> <S%G2372>outbursts<s%> of <S%G2372>anger,<s%> <S%G2052>disputes,<s%> <S%G1370>dissensions,<s%> <S%G139>factions,<s%>

<S%G5355>envying,<s%> <S%G3178>drunkenness,<s%> <S%G2970>carousing,<s%> and things <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G3778>these,<s%> of <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G4302>forewarn<s%> you <S%G2531>just<s%> as I have <S%G4275>forewarned<s%> you that <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4238>practice<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G5108>things<s%> shall not <S%G2816>inherit<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

But the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> is <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G5479>joy,<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%> <S%G3115>patience,<s%> <S%G5544>kindness,<s%> <S%G19>goodness,<s%> <S%G4102>faithfulness,<s%>
<S%G4240>gentleness,<s%> self-control; <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G5108>things<s%> there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3551>law.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who belong to <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> have <S%G4717>crucified<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> with its <S%G3804>passions<s%> and <S%G1939>desires.<s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> we <S%G2198>live<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> let us <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4748>walk<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>
Let us not <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2755>boastful,<s%> <S%G4292>challenging<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G5354>envying<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>
